001package imagingbook.common.util;
002
003import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.util.zip.DataFormatException;
006import java.util.zip.Deflater;
007import java.util.zip.Inflater;
008
009/**
010 * This class performs ZIP-compression and decompression on 
011 * byte arrays.
012 * 
013 * @author WB
014 * @version 2022/09/06
015 */
016public class ZipCompressor {
017
018        private final boolean nowrap;   // true -> ZLIB header and checksum fields will not be used
019        private final int bufsize;
020        
021        public ZipCompressor(int bufsize, boolean nowrap) {
022                this.bufsize = bufsize;
023                this.nowrap = nowrap;
024        }
025
026        public ZipCompressor() {
027                this(1024, true);
028        }
029        
030        // -----------------------------------------------------------
031                        
032        public byte[] compressByteArray(byte[] inputBytes){
033                Deflater deflater = new Deflater(Deflater.BEST_COMPRESSION, nowrap);
034                deflater.setInput(inputBytes);
035                deflater.finish();
036
037                final byte[] buf = new byte[bufsize];
038                byte[] outputBytes = null;
039
040                try (ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream()) {
041                        while (!deflater.finished()) {
042                                int size = deflater.deflate(buf);
043                                bos.write(buf, 0, size);
044                        }
045                        outputBytes = bos.toByteArray();
046                } catch (IOException e) { }
047
048                return outputBytes;
049        }
050
051        public byte[] decompressByteArray(byte[] inputBytes){
052                Inflater inflater = new Inflater(nowrap);
053                inflater.setInput(inputBytes);
054
055                final byte[] buf = new byte[bufsize];
056                byte[] outputBytes = null;
057
058                try (ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream()) {
059                        while(!inflater.finished()){
060                                int size = inflater.inflate(buf);
061                                bos.write(buf, 0, size);
062                        }
063                        outputBytes = bos.toByteArray();
064                } catch (IOException | DataFormatException e) { } 
065
066                return outputBytes;
067        }
068
069        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
070
071        public static void main(String a[]){
072                String inputText = "some really foolish text 12345 $%ยง&";
073                
074                System.out.println("input=\"" + inputText + "\"");
075                
076                ZipCompressor compr = new ZipCompressor();
077
078                byte[] compressed = compr.compressByteArray(inputText.getBytes());
079                System.out.println("compressed=\"" + new String(compressed) + "\" + length=" + compressed.length);
080                //      System.out.println("compressed=" + Arrays.toString(compressed));
081
082
083                byte[] decompressed = compr.decompressByteArray(compressed);
084                System.out.println("decompressed=\"" + new String(decompressed) + "\"");
085        }
086        
087}
